abstract: Morgan Stanley, United Technologies and General Electric are asking Congress to waive tax penalties on businesses that borrow from their offshore units, Congressional aides and lobbyists told Bloomberg News.
lead_paragraph: Morgan Stanley, United Technologies and General Electric are asking Congress to waive tax penalties on businesses that borrow from their offshore units, Congressional aides and lobbyists told Bloomberg News.

headline.main: Morgan Stanley and G.E. Seek Tax Waiver on Loans
